modName: Cliff Break Manor - In-Depth Player Home
summary: Cliff Break Manor, a diverse and in-depth player home situated in The Reach that is based off of Solitude\'s architecture. The home includes all necessary amenities with bonus features that may be purchased in game for modest gold amounts.
descriptionHtml:
Contains:
-*Working Butler* with numerous features involving house improvements (and soon a quest with next release)
-All workbench types (enchanting, forge+others, alchemy)
-Dining Area
-Bedroom Area
-Fireplace / Living room Commons Area
-Basement with special Features
-Spare room which can be converted
-Storage room with many chests and a couple safes
-Library/Study
-Stocked kitchen with fire-pit
-Possibilities of 3 followers
-Possibilities of 3 different creatures which can be put in a cage in your enchanting room (next release they will provide buffs)

Other Info:
-The manor is located on a waterfall, with a great outlook from the central balcony (See Picture)
-There is a stable out front where your horse will be moved to when you fast travel
-All modular features can be bought and changed through Butler
-All NPC\'s have sensible AI packages (Will sleep and eat)

Install Steps:
-Download .ESP
-Enable through the data files in launcher
-Fast travel to manor in-game

Uninstall:
-Disable .ESP in data files (make sure not to be in the manor while doing this)

Additional:
-When using the followers bought through the Butler, make sure to tell the follower to leave you before changing followers through Butler. If you forget to do this, changing to followers you have already purchased is free and you simply need to tell them to leave once re-enabling them to use a new follower
-If you have any design ideas, feature ideas, bug reports, glitches or anything else you can PM me and I will answer as soon as I can, I check fairly regularly. 

Thank you for downloading my Player House
~hertznca
author: hertznca
